overview: Join director Michael Raven as he showcases a priceless collection of cinematic eroticism. With Kirsten Price as the cornerstone cutie in this smoldering all sex movie, you get it all. From blonde bikini clad cuties getting properly hosed down, to a jazz club rendezvous to a prom queen celebrating with her beau, this eclectic showcase of scenes will keep you searching for more Priceless Fantasies.
title: Priceless Fantasies
